entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nanisivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.6°C
entry.summary:

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
